Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents logics of "3x" game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Game.Slot
    Represents a single slot in this game, keeps track of its assigned item, x and y coordinates.
    static enum 
    Game.Values
    Enum specifying all items assignable to cards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int m, int n)
    Class constructor specifying number of columns and rows in game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkAdjacency()
    Collects scoring cards -- scoring cards are touching lastCard and their items are the same as lastCard item.

    getCards()
    Gets all the cards of the game (except current slot and saved slot).

    Gets the slot which contains the current item of the game.

    boolean
    isSavedPicked()
    Checks if player chose saved slot's item for the next move.
    void
    makeStep(Game.Slot chosenCard)
    Makes a single step in this game -- sets chosen slot's item to the item from savedCard or currentCard, sets a new item for current slot, sets lastCard and moves danger items, does not analyze the last step and add score.
    void
    pickCurrentCard()
    Picks current slot, its item will be used in the next step.
    void
    pickSavedCard()
    Picks saved slot, its item will be used in the next step instead of current slot.
    void
    saveCard()
    Sets savedCard's item to currentCard's item.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int m, int n)
      Class constructor specifying number of columns and rows in game.
      Parameters:
      m - number of columns in game's grid (width)
      n - number of rows in game's grid (height)

      Gets the current score in the game.
      Returns:

      public Game.Slot getCurrentCard()
      Gets the slot which contains the current item of the game.
      Returns:

    • getSavedCard

      public Game.Slot getSavedCard()
      Gets the slot which contains the saved item of the game.
      Returns:
      slot with saved item

    • getCards

      public Game.Slot[][] getCards()
      Gets all the cards of the game (except current slot and saved slot).
      Returns:
      array of playing cards of the game

    • getElapsedTime

      public int getElapsedTime()
      Gets the time that has passed since the beginning of the game.
      Returns:
      elapsed time since the start

    • incrementElapsedTime

      public void incrementElapsedTime()
      Increments the time that has passed since the beginning of the game.

    • makeStep

      public void makeStep(Game.Slot chosenCard)
      Makes a single step in this game -- sets chosen slot's item to the item from savedCard or currentCard, sets a new item for current slot, sets lastCard and moves danger items, does not analyze the last step and add score.
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - slot with item to be set

    • saveCard

      public void saveCard()
      Sets savedCard's item to currentCard's item.

    • pickSavedCard

      public void pickSavedCard()
      Picks saved slot, its item will be used in the next step instead of current slot.

    • hasSaved

      public boolean hasSaved()
      Checks if player has any item saved.
      Returns:
      true if there is a saved item in this game

    • pickCurrentCard

      public void pickCurrentCard()
      Picks current slot, its item will be used in the next step.

    • checkAdjacency

      public boolean checkAdjacency()
      Collects scoring cards -- scoring cards are touching lastCard and their items are the same as lastCard item.
      Returns:
      true if player has scored in this step

    • getRandomItem

      public Game.Values getRandomItem()
      Picks random item, each item has a different adjusted probability of it being picked.
      Returns:
      randomly picked item

    • isSavedPicked

      public boolean isSavedPicked()
      Checks if player chose saved slot's item for the next move.
      Returns:
      true if saved slot is chosen

    • isOver

      public boolean isOver()
      Checks if game has ended.
      Returns:
      true if all playing cards are occupied
